title: 92/138/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 February 1992 settling the dispute between the United Kingdom and Germany over the creation of a special regular coach service (Only the English and German texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 12 February 1992  settling the dispute between the United Kingdom and Germany over the creation of a special regular coach service  (Only the English and German texts are authentic)  (92/138/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Cliff's Coaches of Burlington House, 20 Hardwick Street, Buxton, Derbyshire, is to be authorized to operate a special regular coach service exclusively for personnel of the British Armed Forces, their dependants and other persons approved by  the British military authorities between Lemgo, in Germany, and London.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom and to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 February 1992. For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
